description:
The Good Wife series finale will air in May.《傲骨贤妻》全剧大结局将会在今年5月上演。

CBS used its Super Bowl broadcast to break the news that the critically-lauded legal drama will end after its seventh season. Nine more episodes will air.CBS在超级碗广告时间公布了这部好评颇高的律政剧将会在第七季大结局的消息，目前距离大结局还剩9集。

There had been rumblings of The Good Wife ending since its creators Robert and Michelle King announced they were departing to work on summer series BrainDead for CBS. A few weeks later, Good Wife star Julianna Margulies made a reference to her impending unemployment, seemingly confirming that the show was ending.之前《傲骨贤妻》的制作人Robert和Michelle King宣布将会在今年夏季结束后离开剧组，几个星期之后本剧女主演Julianna Margulies也宣布将会离开，所以CBS宣布《傲骨贤妻》被砍也是情理之中的事情。

The series finale will air Sunday, May 8 at 9/8c on CBS.《傲骨贤妻》大结局将会在北京时间5月9日上演。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 重磅！《傲骨贤妻》被砍 第七季大结局！

description:
FX is rounding up quite the cast for its X-Men pilot Legion. Dan Stevens, Aubrey Plaza and Jean Smart have been cast in the drama from Fargo's Noah Hawley, the network announced Thursday.FX电视台周四宣布电视版《X-Men》试播集再加新成员，Dan Stevens、Aubrey Plaza和Jean Smart将会加入这部《冰血暴》导演Noah Hawley指导的新美剧。

Stevens will play David Haller, a haunted man who was diagnosed as schizophrenic growing up but, after meeting the girl of his dreams, begins to think the voices and visions in his head are real. In the Marvel comics, David is the mutant son of Professor Charles Xavier. The role marks Stevens' first television gig since Downton Abbey.Stevens将会在剧中扮演一位名叫David Haller的精神分裂患者，在现实世界中遇到了自己幻想中的命中注定。在漫威原著中，David是Charles Xavier博士基因变异后的儿子。这是《唐顿庄园》后Dan Stevens的第一部电视剧作品。

title: 《唐顿庄园》大表哥参演新美剧！

description:
First though, another film that defies neat definition, Trash. It's set in Rio de Janeiro where kids picking over rubbish on one of the city's dumps find a wallet. Its contents lead them into dangerous intrigue with corrupt police, old injustice and plenty of action around the city from shanty towns to swanky suburbs. So it's a story with dialogue mainly in subtitle Portuguese for young people. Yet it has themes familiar from gritty gangster films like City of God. The director Stephen Daldry had worked with young actors before, most famously with the film and stage show Billy Elliot. For Trash, he chose some big-name stars like Martin Sheen, but made the crucial decision when it came to the children to cast for real-life experience rather than technique.

"We guessed in the end it would be, nonprofessionals will be the main protagonists and main leads in the film, because it's about three kids who live on a landfill site and work on a landfill site as recyclers. And the challenge felt so extraordinary, we've eventually found the kids we want to work with and then many more months putting them through process of trying to understand what the story might be. The kids in the end we chose had never been to a cinema. But most of the time, it was really listening to them about the story they wanted to tell. So we just gave them the, the really beginnings of what the story might be. It's sort of the venture, treasure hunt really. It's some sort of fantasy film. But what was important to us was making the film make sense to them, knowing that actually in the end the film would have to be improvised."

description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

这首歌是《歌舞青春1》中的第一首歌曲，也是《歌舞青春》这部三部曲式的电影给人留下的第一印象。

演唱者
Drew Seeley(the soundtrack) not Zac Efron & Gabriella Montez(Performed by Vanessa Hudgens)
【德鲁西利（声带）(扎克·埃夫隆饰） 和盖比瑞拉·蒙提兹（凡妮莎·哈金斯饰）】

Didn't understand
That anything can happen
When you take a chance
I never believed in
What I couldn't see
I never opened my heart (ooh)
To all the possibilities (ooh)
I know that something has changed
Never felt this way
And right here tonight

This could be the start
Of something new

To be here with you (ooh)
And now looking in your eyes
I feel in my heart (feel in my heart)
The start of something new

Now who'd of ever thought that (ooh)
We'd both be here tonight (ooh yeah)
And the world looks so much brighter (brighter)
With you by my side

I know it for real

To be here with you (ooh)
And now looking in your eyes
I feel in my heart
The start of something new

I never knew that it could happen
Till it happened to me
I didn't know it before
But now it's easy to see

It's the start
Of something new
It feels so right
To be here with you (ooh)
And now looking in your eyes
I feel in my heart

That it's the start
Of something new
It feels so right (so right)
To be here with you (ooh)
And now looking in your eyes

The start of something new
Start of something new

description:
《标准美音模仿秀》是一档沪江社团的原创口语互动节目（戳我去参加社刊>>），主持人截取30秒左右的英语音频，然后对音频进行重点讲解和示范模仿，并对大家递交的口语模仿作品进行一对一的点评，想要练习纯正美音的童鞋赶快行动起来吧！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

今日主持人：bilibili233

10秒音频：

小编模仿音频： 

模仿文本： "Well, it is a leading operator, online operator of handmade and vintage goods, including jewelry, furniture, clothing. No other company has been able to create this kind of community.”是的，这是一家领先的运营商，是手工制品和古董，包括珠宝，家具和服装的网络运营商。过去从来没有一家公司能够创造出这样的网络社区。
